1.content:
Welcome to the realm of alien frogs. Somewhere in the suburbs of Tokyo, a group of friends and family, some of which originating from another galaxy, get themselves involved in regular but exciting hi-jinks. These hi-jinks usually come from the alien frogs, AKA the Keroro Platoon, trying in vain to conquer Earth or Pekopon as they call it. This time, however, things will be different... maybe. Where should we begin to start off the insanity?

Choose a Character: Exactly as it says. Pick someone to be a main protagonist for the story. This selection doubles as a space for anyone who has anyone more ideas of what kind of scenario will be involved once a character is selected.

New Invasion Scheme: The incompetent Sergeant Keroro comes up with a new plan to invade Pekopon. Considering how his plans usually work in needlessly complicated ways, there is a lot of room for something far-fetched to happen.

Playing with Inventions: The Sergeant Major Kururu, being a mad genius and troll, has made a series of inventions over time that are capable of a wide variety of things. For this type of story, someone has taken one of said inventions for their own purposes.

A Mysterious Threat: Every now and then, an occult force will arrive, whether from the stars or in Pekopon itself, to cause trouble or for other reasons. Like the other options, their powers are widely varied and have the ability to tamper with the status-quo.

Let's Go Somewhere: Sometimes, the aliens and their human friends will go to a different setting from their homes to obtain something or just to have fun and relax. Even in another place, they are not safe from the forces of chaos.
1.title: Where To Begin

11.content:
So you have chosen to take a look at someone's own individual story. Who should we focus on?

Yourself: That's right. You get to add yourself in the story and interact with the others. Aren't you lucky?

The Keroro Platoon: There are five frogs overall in the platoon, each of them different from one another to a fault.

The Hinata Family: The main humans whose house has become the hiding ground for the platoon.

One of the other girls: These girls are not directly involved, but still maintain relevance of their own.

Someone else: There are plenty of other fish in the sea to choose from.
11.title: Choose a Character

111.content: Congratulations, my otaku weeaboo or whatever friend. You get to play as yourself. Before we move on and get into personal details, what is your origin story?
111.title: Yourself

112.content:
You have chosen to take a look at one of our five froggy friends. Which in particular should we focus on?

Sergeant Keroro: The leader of the platoon. As enthusiastic as he can be, he is usually rather lazy. On top of that, he is not very bright nor is he that charismatic. Very often, instead of having an actual plan to actually do his job, he spends his free time building and collecting Gumpla as well as watch anime whenever he is not being roped into household chores.

Corporal Giroro: The no-nonsense gung-ho member of the platoon. He is always ready for a battle, even using this as an analogy for scenarios that don't call for it. Despite his willingness to get the job done, he too is as incompetent as the others due to his infatuation for Natsumi getting in the way as well as his unwilling butt-monkey status.

The other three frogs are in the next chapter.
112.title: The Keroro Platoon: Part One

1123.content:
Here are the other three frogs of the Keroro Platoon to choose from:

Private Tamama: The youngest and lowest ranked member of the platoon. Outside of cuteness and raw power, he is incredibly inexperienced and flawed. On top of having an insatiable craving for sweets, he has an unstable emotional state that leads him vulnerable to having two personalities, especially when his jealousy for Mois is provoked.

Sergeant Major Kururu: The mischievous and mad scientist of the platoon. Despite actually being of a higher rank than Keroro, he contently accepts his position in life and how almost everyone around him is intimidated of his presence. With only Mois' innocent stare and him purposefully complicating Keroro's plans to keep him from going too far, he enjoys being able to do whatever he wants, especially bathing in curry.

Lance Corporal Dororo: The former assassin and reformed ninja of the platoon. Despite his competency as a fighter, there are two things that hinder his ability as an invader. The first problem is that is he is unwilling to go along with any invasion plans that don't involve peaceful and environmentally-friendly means. The second problem is his low aura of presence that makes him really easy to ignore or outright forget, which leads him into a miserable traumatic state mourning how his childhood was no different.
1123.title: The Keroro Platoon: Part Two

113.content:
One of the main humans, eh? Sounds good. Which one do you want?

Fuyuki Hinata: He is the younger sibling of the family, being 13-years old. This young man is friendly towards the aliens, having a deep-seating interest in the occult and all of its mysteries, and even has Keroro as his best friend. His usually introverted and oblivious demeanor hides untapped potential.

Natsumi Hinata: She is the older sibling of the family, being 14-years old. This fiery red-head is a proud athlete and is not afraid to show it whenever she feels Keroro is stepping out of his boundaries, whether it be to act as "Earth's final line of defense" or to get him to do his share of chores.

Aki Hinata: The mother of Fuyuki and Natsumi and one of the those responsible for the series of events happening in the first place when she and her children moved into what would become the Hinata Household. Although she is not home often, she does mean well for her job at the manga industry is a demanding one. Otherwise, this buxom beauty is a good role-model for her children and is someone who even the aliens look up to or take caution over.
113.title: The Hinata Family

choices: she gets turned into something she hates
she makes a bet with Keroro
1132.content: There's one last thing before we truly begin. What should happen to the fiery redhead?
1132.title: Natsumi Hinata

1133.content: OK what should happen to her. There are 3 way. Weight gain, pregnancy or other. As with cause if effect happen to it like she was test by new invention or something strange happen.
1133.title: Aki Hinata

114.content:
Interesting choice you have made. Here are your special options:

Momoka Nishizawa: She is a girl of the same age as Fuyuki who was born into a family who owns a majority of the worlds' economy. Absolutely obsessed over Fuyuki and being too scared to admit her crush to him directly, she repetitively tries to win over his attention with absurdly expensive stunts. She shares a similar case of split personality with Tamama, whom she has befriended and kept as a pet at her mansion.

Koyuki Azumaya: She is a girl of the same age as Natsumi who was born and raised as a ninja. She is among Natsumi's best friends if not her very best friend and is more than willing to show her admiration towards her, especially in ways that would expose her out-bringing and lack of experience in normal human society. Seemingly have no parents of her own, she currently lives alonside Dororo in a peaceful cottage out in the woods.

Angol Mois: She is a girl who is supposedly 2000 years old by our standards who was once prophesied by Nostradamus to be responsible for the apocalypse. She has slept for around 500 years on the planet's orbit in preparation for the big event. However, some convincing from her love interest Keroro, who has looked after her as a child, gets her to delay the whole thing. Being surprisingly kind and approachable, she gets along very well with the humans she befriends to the point they see her as one of them, which is helped from her having at least two humanoid appearances. However, she does regularly help Keroro with his plans and will sometimes even have her "planet destroyer" side shine through.
114.title: One of the other girls

choices: she wakes up after sleeping on the job
she tries to destroy the world again
1143.content: The adorable Lord of Terror? Good choice! Where should we begin her story?
1143.title: Angol Mois

choices: her body looks and feels different
she had been moved somewhere else
11431.content: Mois opens her eyes and lets out a cute yawn. As her blurry vision gradually regains clarity, her mind perks up just as well and she realizes she had sleep on the job again. She hopes that her Uncle Keroro won't get too mad at her, though he is usually understanding in her eyes and rather lazy himself anyway. However, after she has fully regains her senses, she finds that ___.
11431.title: she wakes up after sleeping on the job

choices: cleans up the mess and hopes it won't happen again
gets caught in the act by someone she knows
cleans up the mess and asks one of the girls for help
114311.content: "Wha-?" Mois flinches out of horror upon seeing and feeling lukewarm urine staining her clothes, legs, and even the floor. "No! No! No! No!" She looks around, too embarrassed to stare at her shame and looking for anything she can use to hide and clean up the miss. "I can't let Uncle see this! You could say, news leak?" She tries to compose herself and hold back her tears. She needs to figure out how to get out of this before it can get worse. After a moment's worth of hesitation, she ____.
114311.title: she had wet herself

choices: she will soon have another accident in bed
she soon has another accident outside
she has an accident in front of her friends
1143111.content:
Thankfully for Mois, she had been left on house duty, looking over the Keroro Platoon base, while her comrades were on an adventure without her. She must have fallen asleep from boredom after having one orange drink too many. On top of that, from being the one who does the leader's chores a lot of the time, she readily knows where to look and how to use the cleaning supplies. With plenty of time to spare, she wipes out any trace of her humiliating little mishap.

"Phew! You could say, no harm done?" She sighs in relief. Though it was only a one-time thing, she roams around, trying to keep herself occupied and not push her luck. Eventually, everyone does come back to her and, other than one or two of them asking why she seemed so nervous all the sudden, she is pretty much in the clear. How long does her luck last?
1143111.title: she cleans up her mess

choices: her friends take her spear from her
11432.content:
Mois, currently in her true Angol form, enjoys and expresses herself in the Hinata's backyard. The others, however, are not as joyous, not that she can really do anything to stop herself at the moment. Every strike into the ground with her Lucifer Spear causes the entire planet to shake. In only a few more minutes, if she remains uninterrupted, she will finally be able to finish what she was meant to start as foretold by Nostradamus centuries ago.

"Lady Mois!" her uncle Keroro pleads with her. "Stop! We haven't even invaded and evacuated all the Gumpla yet!" Natsumi angrily hits Keroro in the head and knocks him out.

"Is that all you care about?" He yells at him then turns to Mois. "Please stop, Mois-chan!" Mois ignores her pleas for this is her purpose and reason for being here.

"It's okay." Mois gives her a sincere smile. "It will only take a little longer and then I'm done."

"How many times do we have to tell you that we're not like you and will die if you do this?" Natsumi shouts under pressure. Mois slams her spear onto the ground some more under she feels it has been momentarily tenderized enough to deal the finishing blow.

"Almost done!" Mois wipes the sweat off her face for a job well done thus far. She raises her spear and gets ready to slam onto the earth one last time. "Hellarmaggedon-!" Before Mois can finish, ___.
11432.title: she tries to destroy the world again

choices: her friends come by to try to cheer her up
she tries to preoccupy herself some other way
she awaits even more punishment from Natsumi
114321.content:
"I guess I have no choice," Natsumi gives no other warning before grabbing onto her spear from behind. Fuyuki and the others immediately follow suit and grab onto Mois from all directions while she is locked into place.

"Hey! What are you guys doing? You could say, hands-on approach?" She tries to lower her spear onto the ground once more, but Natsumi truly is surprisingly strong for a human/Pekoponian. She keeps her grip on her weapon until the others Keroro starts tickling her, giving Natsumi the opportunity to peel it from her hands.

"Oh, no! My Lucifer Spear! Please give it back!" Mois begs Natsumi. She doesn't want to get in trouble from the rest of her family for losing an important heirloom. Natsumi just keeps it away from her as it reverts to its cell phone form.

"I'm sorry, Mois-chan, but I can't risk it anymore." Natsumi starts leaving with it. "I'm leaving it with the Kero-Ball. I'll let you hold onto it for a little bit if you get any calls." The frogs, particularly Keroro, go snow-white out of nervousness; the Kero-Ball had long been stored away for safe-keeping under the watch of the Hinata siblings for being too powerful. For it or anything else to be taken away means that it will take much sweat and tears to obtain them again for even a short time. They just look at Mois with sympathy, whom is still begging and going teary-eyed from the revelation. Even Natsumi doesn't seem to be comfortable with this decision, feeling like a cruel mom who just took away her darling child's favorite stuffed animal, but Mois needs to learn her lesson.

As soon as the deed has been done, the Lord of Terror solemnly acknowledges her failure and takes some alone time. What will she do from here?
114321.title: her friends take her spear from her

choices: she volunteers for one of Kururu's experiments
one of her friends come to visit
11433.content: I got more options than that. How about these?
11433.title: something else

114331.content:
Most people would take one look at Kururu and deny wanting to spend with him, knowing right away that he will cause nothing but trouble. However, Mois, being the pure and sweet girl she is, would give him a chance, despite the warnings from everyone else. In fact, just a moment ago, Kururu asked her if she would like to volunteer for an experiment. Of course, Mois agreed, figuring that it would help her Uncle with the invasion or, at least, give her something to do.

She joins him to his domain and laboratory deep in the Keroro Platoon's base. In the center of the otherwise empty room is a metal operating table clearly meant for her.

"Please sit down right here. Kukuku." Kururu chuckles and points to the table. For a normal person, being alone with the mad scientist, on top of him speaking in an unusually polite tone, would raise a couple of red flags. However, Mois takes it in earnest.

"Oh, thank you." Mois takes a seat. She crosses her legs to make herself more comfortable on the cold metallic surface. "So, what neat new invention do you need my help with testing? You could say, crash test dummy?"

Kururu chuckles some more. "Well, actually, I need your help with ___."
114331.title: she volunteers for one of Kururu's experiments

choices: she no longer has a body
she is in a different body
1143311.content:
"Wait." Mois had to pause from confusion. "You want to tinker with my brain?" She is not sure if she should let Kururu go through with this. It is obviously riddled with life-threatening risks, but, despite how untrustworthy Kururu can be as a person... frog... thing, she does trust that Kururu will not fail in his experiment and leave her for dead. Before she can think up of a response, her wrists and ankles suddenly get bolted onto the table. What seemed like an ordinary mad scientist operating table has securely pinned her into place via mechanical arms.

"Don't worry. This will not hurt at all. I press!" Kururu proclaims and presses a button. A breathing mask descends from the ceiling and attaches itself to Mois' face. As she takes deep breathes to try to calm herself, a sophisticated knock-out gas makes its way into her body. In only a few seconds, Mois closes her eyes and loses consciousness.

---

"...Mr. Sinister?" Mois asks. From the silence, it seems like Kururu had already operated on her. From the fact she can only see darkness, it is probable that she is still in the laboratory down below. She tries to get up and analyze her surroundings and finds that...
1143311.title: experimental brain surgery

choices: she responds robotically to someone's commands
she finds herself acting more like someone she knows
11433111.content: Other than a small temporary scar on her head, Mois sees that she looks exactly like herself. She wonders what exactly Kururu did to her when suddenly...
11433111.title: she still has her body

choices: she has feelings for someone other than her Uncle Keroro
114331113.content: Mois could not find any immediate and blatant changes with her behavior or personality. However, she soon finds something else that may disturb her. She eventually finds that ___.
114331113.title: other mental changes

choices: her body is under new ownership
her body is also in storage to be studied
her body has disappeared or been thrown out
11433112.content: "Hey! I can't move! Hello? It's dark in here! Can anyone turn on the lights?" " Mois tries calling for anyone to help her, though she can't seem to hear her own voice, let alone anything else. Not to mention, she doesn't seem to be able to see or touch anything either. The lack of senses quickly starts to make her panic. Unbeknownst to her, she is currently residing in a well-lit bacta tank, but not as herself. Kururu has indeed operated on her brain, as in he has removed her brain from her body and placed it into storage. Without anything to distinguish her surroundings, it will take a while before she can realize that her body is gone. Speaking of which, what happened to her body?
11433112.title: she no longer has a body

114331121.content:
The darkness leaves what is left of Mois' vision. She can now see more clearly; however, seeing static and pixels instead of the clarity she is used to, she is clearly seeing through a camera that has been installed onto her exposed brain.

"I...I can see?" she hears herself asking, though her voice is just as artificial as her newfound sight. She tries to see if she can move, finding very quickly that she is stuck in a stationary tank. Considering that she still has her senses, though, she finds enough of a reason to remain calm.

"Thank you for giving me your body. I will put it into great use." her own voice sneers at her. If not for the fact she is stuck in place, Mois would have jumped in shock. Her own body, smiling at her, approaches from the darkness. Other than the scars around her head indicating surgery, she looks exactly like she did moments before.

"Who are you? Why do you look like me?" Mois tries to make sense of what is going on.

Her double quickly makes clear to her that she was once ___.
114331121.title: her body is under new ownership

choices: seems to be cloned off of her original body
is a double of someone she knows
11433113.content: Mois manages to find and flick a light-switch. With the lights now activated, she can see as clearly as day that her body is not the one she had until now. Alarmed and confused, she finds a reflection from a nearby shiny metal surface to try to rationalize the situation. She sees a large scar a lot like Giroro's own scar running through her forehead, indicating that her brain had been removed and re-inserted into this foreign body. She tries to find any more details and quickly finds that her new body ___.
11433113.title: she is in a different body

114331131.content: "Huh? What is this?" Mois is starting to get a little scared. Her current body looks so familiar and yet feels so wrong. She looks into the eyes of her reflection and finds they are still the exact same as they were before. She looks at the rest of her body and eventually finds out that she is now herself as a(n)___.
114331131.title: seems to be cloned off of her original body

choices: checking with Natsumi and the others for help
having her reunite with her new twin sister
trying to figure out her new body themselves
1143311311.content:
"Eh?" Mois checks her reflection. She doesn't look any different, but she sure does feel different. Her unique strength, her light, the Will of the Cosmos, etc. feels stripped out of her. It's almost like she's... Desperate to not think too hard about that, she tries changing into her other form just to be sure. But... it never came. Everything that made Mois an Angolian was left in her old body left in storage.

"Why am I a Pekopon-jin?!" She uses the alien word for 'human'. Checking further, it seems that her new body wasn't cloned off of her per-say, but rather Asami, the human she had chosen to model herself after. No matter what she tries, her tan skin and blonde hair is no longer a facade but rather her real body.

"I'm sorry for the deception, Mois-dono, but it needed to be done," a familiar voice calls out to her. From the shadows steps out Keroro, solemn from guilt.

"Uncle!" Mois' hearts tears from the betrayal. She tries to express herself with her powers, but like the rest, that was gone too. From there, she is left to simply bawl into tears. The fact that she didn't have powers anymore, presumably unable to even use her Lucifer Spear, doesn't bother her nearly as much as the fact that her beloved has stripped her of her cherished heritage. Her parents would never have approved of their old friend doing this, would they? "You did this? But why?"

"I didn't have a choice," Keroro looks away from her tearful eyes. "The Keron military and intergalactic police force can no longer tolerate a planet destroyer roaming around Pekopon. It was either I had Kururu separate you from your powers or we would have to get rid of you. I'm sorry."

"...I see," Mois, forced to have a clearer head, thinks it over while wiping away her tears. With the explanation given, this was probably the best choice for her. With her old body in storage and under Kururu's expert care, she can expect that her former identity would remain safe and sound. That and the fact she can still be with her friends is enough to give her some form of calm. However, she still does shed some more tears. Being a planet destroyer is what gave her a lot of passions and hobbies and now she'll have to rebuild herself anew.

"I don't care if you're one of them now," Keroro assures her. "You're still more than welcome in my Platoon." He gives her a small hug. Mois, moved by his kind words, hugs him back with forgiveness in her heart. At least she still has him to give her meaning, but what about the other little details?

"Thank you, Uncle. So...what now?" she asks her amphibious mentor, to which they quickly come to the conclusion of ___.
1143311311.title: Pekopon-jin Mois

1143312.content:
"Oh? That again?" Mois asks, surprised that he would ask for something so mundane. Kururu is notorious for filming the girls in secret, especially Natsumi and Aki. Sometimes, he would make merchandise with their likeness to sell to the black market. However, when it comes to her, he almost always asks her permission first since it was usually in behalf of her Uncle's aloof invasion schemes. "What's the theme this time?"

"Funny you should ask," Kururu smiles with his usual toothy grin. "It involves ___."
1143312.title: filming some fetish videos

choices: ...maybe. ...I guess I can give it a try.
I... I think I hear Uncle calling for me.
11433121.content:
"Diapers?" Mois almost perks up from the embarrassing idea. "I...I didn't know you were into that sort of thing."

"I'm not, but I could use a laugh and it is selling like wildfire right now." Kururu replies with blunt honesty.

"...oh," Mois looks down to hide her blush. While Kururu is willing to let Mois have a say, that doesn't stop him from being straight-forward with his intentions. She seriously thinks over her options. She has willingly and happily taken the opportunity to dress herself in cute costumes before, not really caring what happens as a result, but this may be a bit much, even for her. She could just say 'no, thanks' and forget about it, but she is not quite sure. She is not typically the type of person to refuse a favor, whatever money made from her likeness could fund the invasion (or at least her Uncle's Gumpla collection), and it does actually peak at her curiosity (a cute costume is still a cute costume).

Mois eventually responds, "___"
11433121.title: request for abdl

11433123.content:
"So you're not going to have me put on my cute cow costume or have me star as an adult baby?" Mois asks.

"Kukuku, no. Not this time." Kururu confirms. Mois can work with not doing either of those things. She didn't think she can handle being tickled or that she would look that cute in a diaper anyway.

"So what are we doing then? You could say, prolonging the inevitable?" Mois asks again. What theme does Kururu have in mind?
11433123.title: something else

choices: Keroro having been turned into a humanoid girl
a libido pill for her to take
coordinates for an asteroid she can destroy if she plays along
114331231.content:
"Wai-!" Mois gets easily flustered from the idea. "But I can't be like that! My heart already belongs to another!"

Kururu just looks at her, not at all surprised that she would be more concerned over her faithfulness towards her Uncle Keroro rather than the concept of showing personal intimacy with another girl. "Not to worry. I know a way around that."

Before Mois can ask, Kururu presses a button and reveals ___.
114331231.title: lesbian

choices: she can do this without anyone else ever knowing
she can be a trap instead
the other girls tag along so she doesn't feel alone
114331232.content:
'What's...that?" Mois reluctantly asks, unfamiliar with that concept. Kururu wastes no time to whisper the facts into her ear. This quickly gets her really flustered. "So I would have a... oh my..." She shields her eyes, feeling rather overwhelmed.

"I can understand if you don't want to do it, but it would make the sergeant a lot of money," Kururu sees if he can bribe her with her desire to please and help their dear leader Keroro however they can. Mois, after having time to think it over, decides she would be most comfortable with this if ___.
114331232.title: futanari

115.content:
Maybe you're one of the minor female characters who sometimes shows up in the series. How about either of these two?

Honey Melody: A bubbly and busty blonde from America. While not a character who interacts directly with the main cast, she does appear from time to time, mostly for fanservice.

Chief Medic Pururu: Keroro, Giroro, and Dororo's childhood friend from back in Planet Keron. Now a highly esteemed medic in the Garuru Platoon, she does check up on them every now and then like a big sister. Just don't make her feel insecure for her age.
115.title: Maybe one of the recurring characters

choices: something to weaken his nemesis Natsumi
pretend to help someone with their problems
have the humans join in what seems like a harmless game
12.content: It seems like Keroro is about to put a new plan into motion to finally invade and conquer Pekopon... not that it will work. However, who knows? Maybe something different will come out of this. What sort of plan does he have for the world this time?
12.title: New Invasion Scheme

choices: transform all of the humans somehow
125.content: What if Keroro doesn't have a plan to influence Natsumi or the other cast members directly? What if he instead tries something that would affect things at a larger scale? It wouldn't actually improve his chances at finally getting his job done, but it would be an admirable effort.
125.title: Maybe Have Him Influence the Masses

choices: If I Could Do My Life Over
Step Onto The Stage Of Adults
13.content:
Which crazy device used in the series should be explored? No; I did not make up the names. Also, yes; you are free to add in ideas that weren't used throughout the franchise.

"If I Could Do My Life Over" Gun: An infamous large blue blaster that has been used many times to age regress whoever gets hit back in their youth. It must be used again to turn someone back, but that can tricky if it breaks, is low on power, you don't how much younger the victim has become, or, in some cases, the victim has been left younger for more than three hours. Whether the victim retains their memories or not depends on the episode.

"Step Onto The Stage Of Adults" Gun: A pink counterpart of the previous invention. It has been used many times to age progress whoever gets hit. However, unlike the age regression ray, there are never any altered memories, the clothes do not change with the body, and the effects are always temporary, usually wearing off at the most awkward time. That's not to say that you can't use some liberties, though.

"We Can Make Everyone Alive" Gun: A ray gun that looks a lot like a Bellsprout from Pokemon. It has the power to turn any animals, including the frogs... err Keronians, into humans... err Pekoponians. The effects are usually temporary, but don't let that stop you if you want to write the contrary. Also, there is nothing that suggests that it can't be used for the opposite effect, so go ahead and use this on the hu- Pekoponians too.

"Soul Diver": It's not a blaster this time. Instead, it is device that allows multiple people to enter another's mind. The person in question is left unconscious in a chamber, leaving their mind vulnerable to be be seen and even altered. It would not be a stretch if anything life changing or threatening happens to the others while in someone's mind.
13.title: Playing with Inventions

choices: someone takes the blaster with intent to regress
someone activates the blaster by accident
something with a much grander scale
131.content: To be honest, this is probably the best and most iconic choice you could pick. What kind of regression story using the device are you looking for, out of curiosity?
131.title: If I Could Do My Life Over

1311.content:
Alrght. One last question to ask before we finally get started: who will be the one to retrieve the blaster and why? I am aware that was technically two questions, but it was a two-parter, so it counts.

Aki turns herself younger: Finally having a few days off from her manga editor duties and desperate to try something different with her life, she finds the blaster left alone and within reach. Using it will make her life with her son and daughter different to say the very least.

Keroro turns Natsumi younger: Keroro borrows the device, intent on using it to put the tyrannical Natsumi in her place once and for all. He would not able to get the entire platoon on his side since Giroro, at least, would hurt him if he even plucks a single hair on her head. However, that is not to say that Keroro would do this solely for the invasion.
1311.title: someone takes the blaster with intent to regress

13111.content:
Aki yawns out of boredom and gets off the couch. Usually, she would be spending time on her career, but she had been given about half a week off on paid vacation. On the surface level, this would seem great since she would have more time to spend with her kids. However, they have become so busy with own lives lately that she would not have much time to spend time with them anyway. She looks around for any source of company, but she finds no such thing, which is an oddity in the Hinata Household.

"Huh. The one time I actually have extended time off and there's no one here. Not even Kero-chan and his friends are anywhere in sight." She sighs and looks over a standing framed photo of her and her two children, Natsumi and Fuyuki, from when they were kids. "If only there was someway I can... huh?" She sees a large familiar blue object on the floor that was hidden from her sight behind the framed photo.

"Isn't this the thing that makes people younger?" She picks it up, remembering how it has affected her and her children quite a few times in the past. She lets a small smirk slip and ponders to herself. "I don't think Kuru-chan will mind if I borrow this to have some fun here." Desperate to do something fun while everyone is away, she turns the blaster onto herself and fires with intent to become...
13111.title: Aki turns herself younger

choices: waits until they get back from school
goes out to explore the world on her own
sees if she can hang out with them
131111.content:
Aki moans in relief as the light washes away her adult form. Her impressive breasts dwindle back to modest size, leaving her black shirt draping over her slimming hips. At the last second, she manages to hang on to her loose tan pants and white panties before they fall off. Her face melds to give off an impression of youth as her muscles dim, giving her the appearance of her son if he was a girl.

"Ooh. This is so nice," Aki hugs onto her herself out of comfort. Though she has been regressed before, the novelty of such an experience is far from stale. On top of giving her inspiration for her literary work, being around the age of her teenage kids gives her a sense of understanding. After putting on their hand-me-downs, she checks the time and ___.
131111.title: from mom to teenager

131113.content:
Aki had, as of late, thought about what it was like to be a baby. She didn't remember what it was like when she was a baby, at least, not for certain, but she guessed that it was a more innocent and care free time. She wanted to be a bit more care free now that she had some time off. Besides, she felt this could be an inspiring experience for her manga work. So once she fixed the settings and fired upon herself, she began to get much smaller, though from her perspective, it seemed the world got much bigger.

As the gun did its work, time seemed to rewind as her adult shape reverted to a much younger state, adult curves giving way to baby fat, and her arms and legs getting shorter and chubbier. Eventually, Aki found herself sitting with her clothing pooled around her, but that too started to shrink down, changing to fit with her new age. What was once a beautiful woman now sat an adorable baby girl, wearing a cute little green dress, a tiny ponytail and a diaper.

The formerly adult Aki held her hands up to her face and was surprised to find them small and chubby rather than slender. And as she looked down at her feet, she couldn't help but find them rather fascinating. She started wiggling her toes and then playing with them. She started rocking back and forth on her little tush as she held onto her little feet, before she leaned backwards too far and then fell onto her back. While she was momentarily startled by this, she wasn't hurt. Instead, she giggled as her legs kicked the air. Something about this all felt so fun to her.

When Aki sat back up, she managed to find a mirror that was down to her level and crawled over to it. She stared at the strange figure looking back at her for a bit. It resembled a baby girl with a cute green dress, a little ponytail, and a diaper, like what she was wearing. She began playing around with her hair a little, almost as if some of her adulthood still remained somewhere, and the strange figure did the same. She then looked at the figure curiously while holding a finger to her mouth, and the strange figure did the same. She sat up a little, leaned closer, then placed her hands on the mirror, and the strange figure did the same. Her hands feel like glass, thought Aki. Then she suddenly realized something. The figure in the mirror... was her!

Aki fell onto her back giggling again, before getting up and looking back at her reflection. She couldn't believe just how cute she now was. It had been quite some time since she saw some pictures of herself like this, and as she posed and looked herself over, it was quite hypnotizing to see herself like this.

Then she remembered, she wanted to be able to enjoy this more youthful state while she could, and she didn't want to waste all her time in front of a mirror. The world awaited for her! Well, as much of the world as she could reach in her tiny grasp, that is...

What should she do now?
131113.title: Baby Aki

1311131.content:
Aki was feeling in the mood to explore around, to have an adventure in her more youthful state. But first, she had to see if she was still capable of walking.

So Aki began to slowly lift herself up on shaky legs. She stood up for a bit before losing her balance and falling on her padded rear. Aki was surprised to find that standing was a little more difficult at this age than she thought. Still, she tried again. The second time, when she attempted to move forward after standing up, she fell onto her tummy. She could feel tears forming in her eyes, but she quickly dried them off with her arm and put on a brave face. Finally, after sitting back up, she pulled herself up to a standing position using the leg of a nearby table. She held onto the leg for a bit before letting go. After finding her balance, Aki took a step forward. Then another. And another. She finally went quite a distance before falling again. Undeterred, she quickly got back up and stayed up. From there, she was wondering if she could explore the house and see what it was like from a toddler's perspective, or if she could go outside and see if she could find something fun there, even if she was unsupervised. It sounded quite daring, but then again, the former sounded nice, too.

What does she do?
1311131.title: Go Exploring

13111312.content:
It was a nice day out, so Aki decided to go outside for a little bit. She toddled over to the nearest outside door, opened it as best as she could at her small size, and stepped out. When she walked onto the grass, the former adult woman couldn't help but giggle at how it felt to her bare little feet. Then she looked up and saw how big the outside world looked to her. It actually scared her a little bit. Still, she got over it, and chose what to do. She could either wander off a little bit or stay close by and play around at home.

How close or how far will Aki go?
13111312.title: Go Outdoors

131113122.content:
Despite being close to three years of age or under, (she wasn't sure just how old she actually was now,) Aki was daring enough to go off on her own. I'm a big girl, she thought to herself, I can do this.

So she wandered away from the house and started off down the street. She kept close to the sides on the sidewalk, out of the way of anyone or anything coming, not minding how the concrete felt to her little bare feet, nor the lack of supervision that someone her age should likely have. She just felt free, toddling down the street on her own and looking for adventure.

She soon came across...
131113122.title: A Little Further Out

choices: some manga drafts from her work
1311132.content: Aki giggles from the sheer enjoyment towards her current body and situation. She toddles around the house with her stubby legs, looking for something to do. Now that she is a baby girl again rather than an adult woman, everything around her that would otherwise be mundane looks so big and interesting to her. Eventually, she finds and becomes interested in...
1311132.title: Play Around With Something

13111321.content:
Little Aki found a carrying case that contained some of her supplies for work. As she looked further in the case, she found some of the manga drafts she had been working with. She was enraptured by the pretty pictures, and while she was having a hard time reading the words, she had the feeling that they were telling good stories. She wanted to draw some on those drafts, but something inside her told her not to do it now.

Then she got another idea. She grabbed some clean sheets of paper and a pencil, and started drawing a manga of her own. Of course, at her younger age, her drawing and writing skills weren't nearly as advanced, but she was giving it her all, nonetheless. By the time Aki was finished, what she came up with didn't resemble a traditional manga of any kind to adult eyes, but she was still happy with it. She could see it playing out in her mind now, even, with herself in a lead or key role.

What sort of manga did Aki make, and what was she imagining?
13111321.title: Some manga drafts from her work

13113.content:
No? Okay. How about these choices?

Tamama turns Mois younger: Tamama decides to make matters into his own hands and put an end to the love triangle threatening his relationship with the sergeant. However, will regressing Mois actually give him less or more to worry about when he has to look after her?

Fuyuki turns Momoka younger: Two friends, a boy and the girl with the girl being in love with the boy, find the blaster and they decide to have fun with it. Will Momoka be open to the idea of becoming too young for love and will she find joy in having Fuyuki as a big brother for a change?
13113.title: more choices

132.content: With this device, one of the characters is about to blossom into a fully grown wo(man). Perhaps they will do this to themselves or they may be affected by someone else for their own gains. Whatever the case may be, that will be for you to decide. First, however, who should be given attention?
132.title: Step Onto The Stage Of Adults

1323.content: Alright. I can see how you may want something different, considering that Natsumi has been turned into a busty young woman multiple times. How about these girls then?
1323.title: one of the other girls

choices: maybe make one of the guys older instead
13233.content: Okay, okay. I got something different in mind. How about one of the two girls Natsumi goes to school with? They are not used to these kind of shenanigans compared to Natsumi, so there may be comic gold here.
13233.title: still need more girls

134.content:
At least one of the members of Keroro Platoon have come under the conclusion that if their enemies cannot be defeated by physical means, then more drastic psychological means will have to do. The target have to be knocked out and put into the Soul Diver chamber for them to get inside their mind and alter it to their whim. Who will be the target of this Inception parody and why?

For this chapter, the Keroro Platoon will be working together to keep their nemesis Natsumi Hinata out of the way. However, if that is the story to stick with, then there are two ways to proceed.

Option 1: They cut out the middleman and confront Natsumi directly while she is alone. Through sheer luck, they manage to knock her out and later get inside her mind. They hope to alter her memories so that she would either want to work for them or lose her fighting spirit, assuming that the love-struck Giroro doesn't have a change of heart.

Option 2: They avoid the risk of getting caught in Natsumi's wrath and Giroro chickening out. Instead, they manage to trick Natsumi's mom Aki to volunteer for the experiment. They enter her mind in hopes of convincing her to join their cause and getting her to stop Natsumi from laying a hand on them.
134.title: Soul Diver

1343.content:
I'm guessing that their intentions may not involve the invasion, let alone Natsumi, after all. If that's so, who else could be put into the Soul Diver and for what reason?

Option 1: Keroro and Tamama specifically feel a bit greedy and decide to turn on the rich heiress Momoka Nishizawa for her money. Keroro convinces the others Platoon mates to join in and explore her mind out of the pretense that they will use her for the invasion. Of course, Tamama just wants more sweets and Keroro is single-minded when it comes to Gumpla. Will they be able to survive the barrage of her feelings towards Fuyuki being given form?

Option 2: Tamama has reached his peak when it comes to his jealousy towards Angol Mois and her staying close to Keroro. Save for the mad scientist Kururu, whom agrees to work together with Tamama for his own amusement, Tamama keeps his intentions hidden. After getting the happy-go-lucky girl inside the device, he musters up the courage to go inside her mind in hopes of nullifying her as a romantic rival.
1343.title: different person for different reasons

choices: I Can Hear Your Voice Now System
135.content:
You're not interesting in changing someone's age, species, or mind? Okay. How about these?

"Chikururu Adams": Also known as the "Tree of Gum". As long as you don't try to make a chocolate-flavored gum (something about the oil content causing the whole thing to rot and melt), this artificially-created plant sprouts tiny blocks of gum. This gum, when consumed, can alter a wide variety of things from its user, whether it be their state of mind, their weight, etc. This thing appears solely in chapter 128 in the manga and episode 236 in the anime.

"I Can Hear Your Voice Now System": One of my personal favorites of mine that don't involve transforming the victim that was used in episodes such as episode 134. Once this cone-like device is inserted onto someone's head, they are vulnerable to having their bodily movements being remote controlled against their will.
135.title: More Inventions

choices: Keroro takes control over one of the Hinatas
Tamama takes control of Mois to try to get rid of her
1352.content: One of the frogs retrieves a cone shaped device that, when placed on the someone's head, grants them complete remote control over their body. On top of that, if they can speak, the user can even speak through a microphone and take control over their speech. What exactly should happen here?
1352.title: I Can Hear Your Voice Now System

13521.content: The silly and incompetent commander of the platoon himself decides to have a go at using the device. Obviously, since the Hinatas are, to him, debatably the strongest humans who can get in the way, taking control over them would grant a significant advantage. The one boy in the family, Fuyuki, on top of being his best friend, is not particularly strong, though, so he would be left out. He has two options: both of which would be a big deal. He could take control over the red-headed hothead Natsumi, ridding himself of an immediate threat. The other choice, though, is Aki, the relatively calm but beautiful and tough mother. Using her, Keroro could have himself a powerful warrior and still keep Natsumi in line. He quickly decides to use the device on ___.
13521.title: Keroro takes control over one of the Hinatas

14.content: This time something new stops by to meet with the cast and possibly bring them something more than they can chew. But what can it possibly be? With all of the creatures they have faced, it can be anything.
14.title: A Mysterious Threat

15.content:
I see you want to change the scenery to be somewhere else other than the Hinata Household. Here are some canonical locations if you are interested in that.

Akina Hinata's Home: The home of Aki's mother and, by extension, Natsumi and Fuyuki's grandmother. Taking place in a serene secluded area in the forest, her family and their alien friends would often go out of their way to visit her. However, even there, there is room for insanity to appear in the form of reappearing memories, forest spirits, etc.

Alien Street: An underground shopping district hidden beneath Inner Tokyo. Solely populated with aliens, and the few humans allowed to enter as long as they are under disguise, it is a reliable place for the alien characters to be themselves and collect supplies. Some services, food, and artifacts there may be a bit too much for human comprehension.

Doinaka Beach: Every summer, the cast would hang out at the beach to enjoy the water or relax under the sun. As long as there is an adult to supervise or one of the human characters gets age progressed, Aki does not mind if her children and their friends go off on their own. At the same time, everyone who goes to the beach are invited to participate in heavily publicized contests to win special prizes.

Kissho Academy: Usually, while the aliens have the Hinata Household all to themselves, the younger human characters would be at junior high. Usually, Natsumi can count on being at school to allow herself a break from dealing with the frogs and their hi-jinks; however, luck is often not on her side. She, her brother Fuyuki, and their friends would have to be extra diligent to keep themselves from seeming suspicious in cases where the frogs do arrive to cause trouble.
15.title: Let's Go Somewhere

choices: yes because one of the adults volunteer
no because no one has volunteered
she wants somebody else to have their turn
153.content:
"Phew!" Natsumi walks into the living room, wearing a bikini underneath her summer clothes with sunglasses on her forehead. "I am so ready to get myself a tan!" The usually aggressive girl gives a warm smile, happy to get some rest and relaxation under the sun, even with the stupid frog and friends tagging along as usual.
"But, sis," Fuyuki approaches her in his own summer gear with mild concern. "Don't we need to get Kururu to make one of us older so that mom doesn't get mad at us?"
Natsumi gets speechless for a second. "...oh yeah. I forgot about that part." She sighs, knowing that she is usually the one who ends up being the one who has to take the role. On top of getting unwanted attention from random guys, she would have to worry about suddenly changing back into her true age in the worst possible time. Will Natsumi get a lucky break this time?
153.title: Doinaka Beach

choices: she has the day off and will join along
their grandmother will go with them
she got a friend to agree to escort them
1531.content:
"Actually, I don't think that will be necessary," Aki appears in front of her two children. Both Natsumi and Fuyuki look at her in surprise, having not expected her to suddenly get involved in the conversation.
"What do you mean? Are you letting us go as ourselves this year?" Natsumi asks her mother. Fuyuki stays silent to listen in to what their mother has to say.
Aki gives them both a warm smile and clarifies that ____.
1531.title: yes because one of the adults volunteer

15313.content:
"I got a friend to agree to look after everyone in my absence." Aki replies blissfully, though both of her children can tell that she feels bad that her busy work life has kept her from being able to tag along again.
"A friend? Who?" Natsumi asks with even more curiosity than before. "Is it someone we know?"
"Maybe," Aki is now giving them a cheeky smile. "I figure that at least one of you will recognize who it is." Before either Natsumi and Fuyuki can ask anymore questions, someone walks in through the front door Aki just left open. It turns out to be...
15313.title: she got a friend to agree to escort them

choices: Koyuki appears and volunteers for her friend
1533.content: "Not this time!" Natsumi shouts, almost coming off a bit too angry towards her brother. "I have to be the one almost every single time. Why can't somebody else do it this time?" She pouts and crosses her arms in frustration. Fuyuki sighs to himself, figuring that Natsumi has made a fair point. Who should take her place this year?
1533.title: she wants somebody else to have their turn

choices: he actually has a six pack as an adult
he actually changed into an adult woman
he looks exactly as expected at that age
15331.content:
Fuyuki sighs, "I guess I'll take it this time."

"Thank you, Fuyuki!" Natsumi loudly exclaims with relief. "You're the best little brother I can ask for! ...though I guess, while we're there, you'll be my big brother."

"Yeah. I guess," Fuyuki tries not to think too hard about that. He just hopes that the girls, especially Momoka, won't make it too weird. Though he is a boy, he isn't exactly ready to have girls stare at him, though that sentiment does give him some empathy to cut his sister some slack.

It isn't long before the yellow frog scientist Kururu arrives with his ray gun to make the necessary changes. He lets him fire right into his chest, wearing only his bathing suit, and awaits his changes. By the time the deed has been done, the now older Fuyuki as well as everyone else are surprised to see see that ___.
15331.title: Fuyuki volunteers for his sister

15333.content:
"Fuyuki?" Natsumi tries giving Fuyuki the puppy-dog eyes. "Would you mind being my big brother for this trip? Pretty please!"
Fuyuki blushes and stutters at the thought. "I can't do that! That would be too weird!"
Natsumi sighs again. "That's not fair. You think this isn't awkward for me?" She quickly relents, figuring that Fuyuki won't change his mind and that there were others who would probably want to help. She stares into the ceiling vent for a few seconds, excepting her best ninja friend Koyuki to arrive in her time of need. However, there is no sign of life to be found.
"Wait," Fuyuki gleams, having an idea of how to handle this. "What if we can get ___ to help us?"
15333.title: someone else

info.brief_description: The one Sgt. Frog / Keroro Gunsou interactive to rule them all!
info.description:
Here are my rules for how this will work:

1) All entries being made must be at least two sentences long. Just asking what should happen next seems like lazy writing.

2) Do not make any chapters that end the interactive. If someone can keep the story going, then let them keep it going. If a narrative concludes in a "beginning to middle to end" fashion, then simply allow people to make a sequel or something.

3) The entries you make can be concise, but they must get to the point as soon as all necessary questions are answered. There are too many chapters in other interactives that would have characters getting age regressed and then ask what specific age they will become instead of what whether they are turned into a baby or a little kid or whatever. As soon as the characters, setting, and circumstance has been established, I want everyone involved to get right into the story instead of wasting good chapter space.

4) Don't be intimidated from the content rating. I simply made it this way to allow more artistic freedom. That said, I will apply some standards regarding said rating. If I find anything I deem inappropriate or get notified for anything that is deemed as such, I will have to take necessary action in order to remedy the problem.

5) By adding content to this interactive, you consent that I have the right to edit or delete your work if it breaks any of the other rules or if the grammar is just that bad. I will not penalize people for grammar and spelling mistakes and will leave minor errors alone unless you wish to request me to fix your own content for whatever reason.

Other than that, as usual, please feel free to contribute and enjoy.
